body:
Add a package for VTune

_Originally posted by @rscohn2 in https://github.com/spack/spack/issues/20403#issuecomment-814079607_

Some parts of the VTune installer require sudo to install the driver and would create root-owed files in spack managed files. I see that that the parallel studio spack package allowed installing vtune. Is the driver install optional? Is that useful?
title: Package for oneAPI VTune
